parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows or hides the notebook on the map screen, if enabled for the mission. (default [[true]]). It is no longer relevant to Arma 2.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''showPad''' show

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  show: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>showPad [[false]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[shownPad]], [[showCompass]], [[showGPS]], [[showRadio]], [[showWatch]]
</value></part></template>
